title: To provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries of pasta.
content: Directs the Customs Service to liquidate or reliquidate certain entries of pasta and to refund any amounts owed. Provides that in specified circumstances, refunds shall be paid to an importer only to the extent that funds are available in the special account established under the Tariff Act of 1930 with respect to the antidumping order covering a specified antidumping duty rate.
